title: Slow cooker Thai green fish curry
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons sunflower oil', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1 green chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '2cm piece root ginger, chopped', '4 teaspoons Thai green curry paste', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', 'juice of 1 lime', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk', '220ml vegetable stock, warmed', '450g firm white fish, cubed', '3 carrots, peeled and chopped', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '3 spring onions, chopped', '1 bunch chopped fresh coriander', '1 sprig Thai basil, leaves chopped']
